description:
It is the year 2062, two decades after the failure of a massive workforce automation project. However, Artemis, the artificial intelligence at the core of that project, had decided to attack humanity, and the resulting war laid waste to Earth.
A lone girl, http://anidb.net/ch11472 [Empress], wakes up in an underground laboratory at a base. She is one of three surviving guardians of humanity. However, she has no memories of what came before. All she knows is what http://anidb.net/ch122100 [a colonel] of the peace-building force tells her.
Artemis is constructing a space elevator to link the Moon and Earth, and Empress is ordered to destroy the space elevator before its completion. If the elevator is completed, the hordes of giant mechanized forces being mass-produced on the Moon will descend upon Earth.
However, standing in the way of Empress are her supposed allies http://anidb.net/ch15711 [Dead Master] and http://anidb.net/ch20088 [Strength], as well as the unmanned pawn forces of Artemis, Smiley of the "Educational Institution" cult, and more.
Empress makes her advance towards the space elevator with the colonel and others. What awaits them there...
Source: Official site, translated

REGULAR.description:
Twenty years after Project Elysion failed and has left Earth in ruin, a girl, Empress, wakes up in an underground research facility. With no memory of her past, Empress meets Norito and Miya, and they head to the surface. However, they are ambushed.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: The Good, The Bad & The Mechanics
The Good, the Bad & the Mechanics
The Good, the Bad & the Mechanics

REGULAR.description:
Empress takes Norito and Miya back to their mountain town, but they`re suddenly attacked by Strength, an ex-ally. They flee from this losing battle and Empress is tasked with retrieving supplies from the remains of a nearby hospital, where a dangerous Beehive situates.
Source: Disney+

Empress and the others head to the Peacebuilding Force`s garrison. They find vehicles belonging to the cult Educational Institution. Realizing they`re being pursued, Empress heads towards the vehicles herself. Upon realizing that they are after Momiji, Empress and the others saves Momiji. who also has a rescue mission of her own involving an armored train.
Source: Disney+

Empress and the others find out from Major Volt that they`ve only got one month until the Orbital Elevator is complete. The Dead Master engages negotiations and an ambush occurs. Charlotte, an enhanced human, is released by the Educational Institution. Empress attempts a counter-attack, but the colonel stops her.
Source: Disney+

A chance meeting leads Norito to seek Strength`s help. He wants her to call Empress because Miya has been taken by the Educational Institution and is being used as a prize in a game. They are suddenly pursued by soldiers and Strength purges a side of her arm. Strength`s personality changes.
Source: Disney+

Strength and Norito burst into the enemy`s aircraft carrier to save Miya. Empress and the others engages in battle with a squadron of armed guard vehicles. In the laboratory on the carrier, the bodies of dead girls are piled up like trash after having failed adaptability experiments. They find Miya tied up, but they also find Lunatic, Artemis` avatar.
Source: Disney+

After breaking down, Black Trike tells them he can`t self-repair. Monica takes on the repairs, so they head to the Peacebuilding Force Memorial Library for the parts. At the library, they meet a librarian android called Andy. Monica spots something in the records of the colonel`s wife Jessica. She`s about to find out more when she slips and crashes down to the basement.
Source: Disney+

There are two weeks left until the cable from the Moon connects with the Orbital Elevator. If Empress and the others can destroy the Orbital Elevator before then, they can save humanity. However, they must cross the Iron Ocean, leading them to detect powerful organic parts.
Source: Disney+

A readjustment of Empress` physical body helps her recover from a fever. She wakes up in the place she had been searching for: Light House No. 8. There, they find no information relating to Hemiteos Units, but Strength finds a clue that leads them to a laboratory at a separate Light House No. 8, where they find a data storage medium. In the data, somebody has left a message.
Source: Disney+

The battle continues at the remains of Light House No. 8. Lunatic, who was observing the battle, fires a powerful beam towards the surface. Meanwhile, the colonel is attacked by Charlotte in the lab`s adjustment room, and is about to be finished off for good, but Empress comes to save the colonel from impending death.
Source: Disney+

The colonel receives a message that the Iron Ocean is spreading, causing much confusion. Despite a message confirming that the Orbital Elevator is connected, the colonel tells everyone the plan is to get Empress close to the Elevator to destroy it. At the eleventh hour, the Peacebuilding Force begins their bombardment and the final battle begins.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress
The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress
The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress
The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress

REGULAR.description:
The deadly battle unfolds in the wastelands. Empress rejects Lunatic`s offer, and makes it clear that she will fight to the very end. The colonel suffers a drone barrage and faces death. Strength and Dead Master have also sustained heavy damage, and the army is all but destroyed. Is there a way out of this hopeless situation?
Source: Disney+

titles.title: Tokubetsu Henshuuban: Memories of the Journey
特別編集版 Memories of the Journey
